description.gold-silver:
An attack that may
cause a burn.
description.crystal:
An attack that may
cause a burn.
description.ruby-sapphire:
A fiery charge attack that
may inflict a burn.
description.emerald:
A fiery charge attack that
may inflict a burn.
description.firered-leafgreen:
The user makes a
fiery charge at the
foe. It may cause
a burn.
description.diamond-pearl:
The user cloaks
itself in fire and
charges at the foe.
It may also leave the
target with a burn.

target with a burn.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.  Frozen Pokémon may use this move, in which case they will thaw.
effect.shortEffect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.  Lets frozen Pokémon thaw themselves.
